name: QUESTris: A Tetris-like game!
description:
QUESTris is my latest and biggest project I've been working on. At this stage I'm very early in development so many aspects of this game are probably going to change in the future. In QUESTris you use the mechanics of the popular game Tetris to interact with the game world, i.e get resources and fight enemies. You start by the main character's house and make your way through the some-what procedually created world towards the village. Once at the village you can buy items from the Merchant with the gold that you collect from the enemies that you defeat. After passing through the village you make your way to the boss fight. If you defeat the boss you beat the pre-alpha! 

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D to move your character.
  • Arrow Keys to move the tetrominoes.
  • Space to place tetrominoes.
  • Left Shift to store tetrominoes.
  • Left Mouse Button to interact with items, trees, rocks, enemies and NPCs.

Hopefully you enjoy!
